description: Keep the stoke high in all conditions with the best of the best. The men's Stoker bibs offer riders functionality that steps beyond the resort and into the backcountry. The three-layer GORE-TEX build maintains breathability for ultimate moisture management inside and out. Water-resistant zippers and taped seams enhance storm protection, while thigh zips add venting for the uptrack. Center-front entry design allows for easy on-and-off. A stretch backpanel complements articulated knees, and a redesigned crotch gives the mobility to match your ambition. Strategically placed pocket options keep all the right stuff exactly where you need it.
name: Dakine Stoker GTX 3L Bib - Mens
